thread.title: Harbhajan Singh invites PM Narendra Modi to his wedding (Watch video)
thread.title_full: Harbhajan Singh invites PM Narendra Modi to his wedding (Watch video)

title: Harbhajan Singh invites PM Narendra Modi to his wedding (Watch video)
text:
New Delhi: Ace Indian off spinner Harbhajan Singh met Prime Minister Narendra Modi at his office in New Delhi today. 
Harbhajan reportedly invited the PM to his upcoming wedding later this month. 
Harbhajan is getting hitched to his longtime girlfriend and Bollywood actress Geeta Basra on October 29 in a hotel near Jalandhar. 
Many cricketers and Bollywood celebrities are expected to attend the big fat Punjabi wedding. 
The wedding reception will be held in New Delhi on November 1. 
Watch the video of Harbhajan's meeting with the PM here:
